channel.title: Posts on SeeHisFace
channel.description: Recent content in Posts on SeeHisFace

item.title: First post!
item.description: Hello, and welcome to the site. I intend to use this site to help with my biblical studies, allowing me to hopefully explore deeper subjects that I am interested in, and by having to present that information, hopefully to have a deeper understanding of the subjects I discuss here. This should also allow me to develop my writing skills, which are lacking.
